name: HackerMan (Hackin7)
description:
Mindless hacking game. Hack for profit, or slowly see your finances dwindle until you are in debt.

This was made for the Weekly Game Jam 138, with the theme Hack. Besides the obvious meaning of hack as in to hack into computer systems, hack can also mean to cut something forcefully.

Items to cut

  1. Logs: Earn income
  2. Computers: Get revenge on hackers for holding ransom to your computer
  3. Money: Cut it and waste it
  4. Human: Cause Murder and be fined greatly
